plugin.name: Workspace Overview
plugin.description: Visual workspace overview with live window previews for Hyprland

grid.title: Workspace Grid
grid.scale-warning: Current settings exceed screen size. Overview is being scaled down to fit.

hide-empty-rows.label: Hide empty rows
hide-empty-rows.description: Automatically hide workspace rows with no windows

show-scratchpad.label: Show scratchpad windows
show-scratchpad.description: Include special/scratchpad workspace windows in the overview

position.label: Position
position.description: Where the overview appears on screen

barMargin.label: Bar Margin
barMargin.description: Additional margin between overview and bar (when positioned at same edge)

slideAnimation.label: Slide animation
slideAnimation.description: Animate overview sliding in from the bar (disable for instant popup)

accentColor.label: Accent color
accentColor.description: Color used for selection indicator and special workspaces

containerBorder.label: Container border
containerBorder.description: Border thickness of the overview container (-1 for default)

selectionBorder.label: Selection border
selectionBorder.description: Border thickness of the active workspace indicator (-1 for default)
